title: Ashlee Simpson steps out for dinner with husband Evan Ross, mother-in-law Diana and daughter Jagger
text:
She is part of one of Hollywood's most famous families.

And Ashlee Simpson looked every inch the A-lister as she headed to dinner with husband Evan Ross, legendary mother-in-law Diana Ross and daughter Jagger in LA on Tuesday.

The Pieces of Me singer, 35, cut a chic figure in an 80s inspired scarlet trouser suit paired with heels as she held hands with her adorable daughter, four.

Family first: Ashlee Simpson looked every inch the A-lister as she headed to dinner with husband Evan Ross, legendary mother-in-law Diana Ross and daughter Jagger in LA on Tuesday

The outfit featured a stylish oversize blazer adorned with gold buttons, with a matching pair of flared trousers completing the look.

Her blonde tresses were pulled into a chic updo while she accessorised with perspex heels and a leather tote.

Little Jagger looked cute in a yellow dress while Evan, 31, was sharp in a black vest, jeans, a dove grey blazer and a woolen hat.

Diana, 75, was a devoted grandmother as she kissed little Jagger on the head as the family departed after their meal.

Kiss: Diana, 75, was a devoted grandmother as she kissed little Jagger on the head as the family departed after their meal

Ashlee and Evan reportedly began dating in the summer of 2013.

The following year they got engaged in January and were married at Diana's estate in Connecticut on August 31.

Simpson also has a son Bronx, 10 with her ex-husband Pete Wentz of Fall Out Boy.

The couple briefly had their own reality show - Ashlee + Evan - which ran for just six episodes from September to October 2018 and followed the two as they balanced work life and raising their children.

Back in 2004 her show, The Ashlee Simpson Show, aired for two seasons after her big sister Jessica's show Newlyweds: Nick And Jessica had its own three season run.
description: Ashlee Simpson looked every inch the A-lister as she headed to dinner with husband Evan Ross, legendary mother-in-law Diana Ross and daughter Jagger in LA on Tuesday.
